title: Vaibhav Diamond-Studded Gold Bangles - Kangan Set
features: Intricately designed with floral and geometric patterns. Individual bangle features alternating patterns of cubic zirconia studded gold segments. Crafted with a focus on creating a flexible yet sturdy design, allowing for comfortable wear. The bangles showcase the meticulous craftsmanship of our artisans.
occasions: and special occasions. Also suitable as an elegant everyday accessory.
description: These bangles are a testament to the enduring beauty of traditional Indian jewelry, updated with contemporary design elements. Crafted from high-quality 22K gold and adorned with sparkling CZ stones, they offer a luxurious look and feel without the extreme cost of diamonds. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine, making them a treasured addition to any jewelry collection. The unique design makes a statement, embodying both grace and sophistication.
